message.raw: Move PubMultiQueue allocations into plugin constructors, to ensure that they exist when the desctructor tries to delete them.  Also initialize ros::NodeHandle instances to NULL to avoid possible segfault on destruction.
message.html: Move PubMultiQueue allocations into plugin constructors, to ensure that they exist when the desctructor tries to delete them. Also initialize ros::NodeHandle instances to NULL to avoid possible segfault on destruction.
